author: TravisEz13
body:
1. The test does not give the url which fails to verify the failure
1. I've seen similar failures twice.
https://travis-ci.org/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/308584873#L4450

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I saw the URL for WMF 5.1 failed a few times. Th tests here started to fail very recently but the URLs work fine when I open them in a web browser. The cause of test failure seems to be `"This site requires the use of scripts, which your browser does not currently allow"`.

title: WMF link test intermittently fails
